keyword: how many calories in a budweiser
title: How Many Calories in a Budweiser?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a Budweiser, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown for a standard serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Budweiser?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle of Budweiser lager beer; values based on official nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, brand batch, and temperature; alcohol content affects calorie absorption. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard Budweiser beer contains about 145 kcal and 10.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Bud Light (lower carb version)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Budweiser beer?
faqs.a: About 145 kcal in a standard 12 fl oz Budweiser.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Budweiser?
faqs.a: Approximately 10.6 g carbs per 12 fl oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Budweiser have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has 1.3 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Budweiser?
faqs.a: Around 10 mg sodium per 12 fl oz bottle.

faqs.q: Are there calories from alcohol in Budweiser?
faqs.a: Yes, about 5% ABV contributes significantly to the 145 kcal total.
